Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/Wells
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses temp. rerouted EB: 39th, Wallace, Root, Princeton and 39th; Wb: 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 39th and Wells due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 39th, Wallace, Root and Princeton and 39th.

Westbound buses will operate via 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Racine
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Hirsch
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Division, Kostner, North Ave and Pulaski due to street blockage near Pulaski/Hirsch.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Division, Kostner, North Ave and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski and Hirsch.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Garfield and Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Cottage Grove due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Cottage Grove due to signal problems.
As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem and Ashland/63rd at this time.
Shuttle buses are available shortly to provide connecting service between Garfield and Cottage Grove. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.
We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
